metadata.title: CVE-2016-10153 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The crypto scatterlist API in the Linux kernel 4.9.x before 4.9.6 interactsincorrectly with the CONFIG_VMAP_STACK option, which allows local users tocause a denial of service (system crash or memory corruption) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact by leveraging reliance on earliernet/ceph/crypto.c code.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
